name: Leo
haven: Utility tunnels and storm drains beneath the 24th Street corridor
goal: To secure a new, permanent haven in a critical part of the city for the Anarchs by creating a large-scale, coordinated distraction.

merits_flaws.name: Data Networker
merits_flaws.description: Can easily access nascent 1994 data and utility networks for information.

merits_flaws.name: Hideous
merits_flaws.description: Extreme Nosferatu appearance, leading to severe penalties in social interactions outside of the sewers.
